title: Procedural Integrity for Safety-Critical Tasks
content: Procedures for safety-critical tasks must be accurate, usable, and followed. Link procedures to MAH scenarios and ensure they reflect operational reality. Involve end users in procedure development and review. Detailed procedures suit infrequent, complex tasks; simple checklists suit routine tasks. Non-compliance often signals poor procedure design.
openQuestions: Are procedures for your safety-critical tasks accurate and usable?
What procedures are routinely bypassed or modified? Why?
